name: CNContactPickerViewController
desc: A view controller that displays an interface for picking contacts.

items.name: var displayedPropertyKeys: [String]?
items.desc: The CNContact property keys to display in the contact detail card.

items.name: var delegate: CNContactPickerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate to be notified when the user selects a contact or a property.

items.name: protocol CNContactPickerDelegate
items.desc: The methods that you implement to respond to contact-picker user events.

items.name: var predicateForEnablingContact: NSPredicate?
items.desc: A predicate to determine the contact selectability in the list of contacts.

items.name: var predicateForSelectionOfContact: NSPredicate?
items.desc: A predicate to control the return of the selected contact.

items.name: var predicateForSelectionOfProperty: NSPredicate?
items.desc: A predicate to control the properties of the selected contact.
